Academic Experiences & Responsibilities


Organization Level Responsibilities

Worked as one of the Initiator for training Faculty Members and Staff for Online Admission Process (Document Verification and Upload) during Admissions of AY: 2020-21 at NMIMS affiliated Institutes.

  • Technical Hands-on session on developing Document upload and Verification system on 24th July & 26th July 2020.
  • Training on Document verification process for Custodians Team and Document verification Team on 4th August 6th August 14th August 18th Dec 2020.
